Cloudflare DNS (one.one.one.one or 1.1.1.1) is known for its high speed and focus on privacy. It does not filter content and promises not to log user data. Ideal for users prioritizing privacy and performance.

AdGuard DNS (dns.adguard.com) blocks ads, trackers, and known malicious domains directly at the DNS level. This provides a cleaner and safer browsing experience. Good for users who want to reduce ads and protect their privacy.

Quad9 (dns.quad9.net) focuses on security by blocking domains associated with malware, phishing, and botnets. This enhances protection against online threats. Suitable for users for whom internet security is a top priority.

Checks for VPN connections when opening the Quick Settings. More battery-friendly, but detects VPN connections only when Quick Settings are opened. If you usually enable or disable VPN through Quick Settings anyway, this option is sufficient.
Continuously monitors VPN status. Provides an instant response, but uses more battery and shows a persistent notification to stay active.

To receive notifications for background VPN monitoring, you must enable the permission in app settings.\n\nOnce you have granted the permission, you can enable notifications here.
Auto-switch DNS based on network type
Automatically change Private DNS settings when switching between WiFi and mobile data
Checks network type when opening Quick Settings. Battery-friendly, but only detects network changes when Quick Settings are opened.
Continuously monitors network type changes. Instant response when switching networks, but uses more battery and shows a persistent notification.

This feature automatically switches Private DNS settings based on whether you're connected to WiFi or mobile data.

VPN Priority: When a VPN is active, VPN detection takes priority and DNS will be set to Off regardless of network type settings.

Example use case: If your home WiFi router uses NextDNS, set "DNS on WiFi" to Off. Set "DNS on Mobile Data" to Auto or a specific hostname for protection when on cellular networks.
